title: SuperM continues Billboard streak
text: SuperM has appeared on Billboard’s albums chart for the third week running, SM Entertainment said on Wednesday.“SuperM sits at No. 29 of the Billboard 200 albums chart and tops the World Albums chart for the third consecutive week,” the agency said.The seven-member project band released its first EP “SuperM: The 1st Mini Album” on Oct. 4 and set the record of becoming the first debut release from an Asian artist to top the Billboard 200 albums chart, while also taking the No. 1 spot on other charts such as the Artist 100, Top Album Sales, Top Current Albums, Digital Albums, World Albums, Internet Album and World Digital Song Sales.Meanwhile, channel SBS recently aired “SuperM - The Beginning” on Oct. 25, revealing behind-the-scenes footage of the members practicing and preparing for their Los Angeles showcase.By Yoon So-yeon
